image: What objects are present in the image?
How many people are visible in the image?
What colors are dominant in the image?
What is the main activity happening in the image?
Is there any text in the image? If so, what does it say?
What is the background like? Is it indoors or outdoors?
text: What is the main theme or topic of the text?
Are there any relationships mentioned between entities?
How many distinct characters or entities are mentioned?
What emotions or sentiments are expressed in the text?
Is there any reference to a specific location or time?
Does the text describe any actions or events?
audio: What is the general mood or tone of the audio?
How many people are speaking in the audio?
Is there any background noise or sound effects?
What language is the audio in?
Are there any specific emotions expressed in the audio?
What is the main activity or topic discussed in the audio?
